A^{+q}+B\to A^{(q-j)+}+B^{j+}\quad.

italic-E RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-p POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 ARG:end ADDOP:plus italic-U RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-p POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 ARG:end ADDOP:minus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-square-root ARG:start italic-rho POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus italic-z POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:end ADDOP:minus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-p POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-square-root ARG:start italic-rho POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus OPEN:( italic-R ADDOP:minus italic-z CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:end PERIOD:.
E={p^{2}\over 2}+U={p^{2}\over 2}-{Z_{t}\over\sqrt{\rho^{2}+z^{2}}}-{Z_{p}% \over\sqrt{\rho^{2}+(R-z)^{2}}}\quad.

italic-E OPEN:( italic-R CLOSE:) RELOP:equals ADDOP:minus italic-E POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-n POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:minus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-p POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-R ARG:end PERIOD:.
E(R)=-E_{n}-{Z_{p}\over R}\quad.

italic-U OPEN:( italic-z PUNCT:, italic-rho PUNCT:, italic-R CLOSE:) RELOP:equals ADDOP:minus italic-E POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-n POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:minus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-p POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-R ARG:end PERIOD:.
U(z,\rho,R)=-E_{n}-{Z_{p}\over R}\quad.

italic-R POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus NUMBER:2 italic-square-root ARG:start italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-p POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-E POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-n POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end PERIOD:.
R_{m}={Z_{t}+2\sqrt{Z_{t}Z_{p}}\over E_{n}}\quad.

italic-z RELOP:equals italic-z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals italic-R FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-square-root ARG:start italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-square-root ARG:start italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-p POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ADDOP:plus italic-square-root ARG:start italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:end PERIOD:.
z=z_{0}=R{\sqrt{Z_{t}}\over\sqrt{Z_{p}}+\sqrt{Z_{t}}}\quad.

italic-d italic-W OPEN:( italic-t CLOSE:) RELOP:equals ADDOP:minus italic-N POSTSUBSCRIPT:start Omega POSTSUBSCRIPT:end FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-d italic-t ARG:end ARG:start italic-T POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-e italic-m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end italic-W OPEN:( italic-t CLOSE:) PUNCT:,
dW(t)=-N_{\Omega}{dt\over T_{em}}W(t)\quad,

italic-P POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-l POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals NUMBER:1 ADDOP:minus OPFUNCTION:exponential OPEN:( ADDOP:minus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-T POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-e italic-m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end INTOP:integral POSTSUBSCRIPT:start ADDOP:minus ID:infinity POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start ADDOP:plus ID:infinity POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-N POSTSUBSCRIPT:start Omega POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-d italic-t CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
P_{l}=1-\exp\left(-{1\over T_{em}}\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}N_{\Omega}dt\right)\quad.

italic-R RELOP:equals italic-square-root ARG:start italic-b POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus OPEN:( italic-v italic-t CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end PERIOD:.
R=\sqrt{b^{2}+(vt)^{2}}\quad.

italic-T POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-e italic-m POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals NUMBER:2 italic-pi MULOP:divide italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:3 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end PERIOD:.
T_{em}=2\pi/Z_{t}^{3}\quad.

N_{\Omega}=\int_{z_{0}}^{\infty}f(r)dr\quad,

OVERACCENT:tilde ARG:start italic-f ARG:end OPEN:( bold-r PUNCT:, bold-p CLOSE:) RELOP:proportional-to italic-delta OPEN:( italic-E POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-n POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-p POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 ARG:end ADDOP:minus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-r ARG:end CLOSE:)
\tilde{f}({\bf r},{\bf p})\propto\delta\left(E_{n}+{p^{2}\over 2}-{Z_{t}\over r% }\right)

italic-f POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-m italic-c POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-r CLOSE:) RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( NUMBER:2 italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:3 MULOP:divide NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start italic-pi ARG:end italic-r POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-square-root ARG:start FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-r ARG:end ADDOP:minus FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 ARG:end ARG:end PUNCT:, italic-r RELOP:less-than NUMBER:2 MULOP:divide italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end
f_{mc}(r)={Z_{t}(2Z_{t})^{3/2}\over\pi}r^{2}\sqrt{{1\over r}-{Z_{t}\over 2}},% \quad r<2/Z_{t}

italic-f POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:1 italic-s POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-r CLOSE:) RELOP:equals NUMBER:4 italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:3 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-r POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPFUNCTION:exponential OPEN:( ADDOP:minus NUMBER:2 italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-r CLOSE:)
f_{1s}(r)=4Z_{t}^{3}r^{2}\exp\left(-2Z_{t}r\right)

italic-N POSTSUBSCRIPT:start Omega POSTSUBSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals OPEN:[ NUMBER:1 ADDOP:plus NUMBER:2 italic-z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus NUMBER:2 OPEN:( italic-z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:] OPFUNCTION:exponential OPEN:( ADDOP:minus NUMBER:2 italic-z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-Z POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-t POSTSUBSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
N_{\Omega}=\left[1+2z_{0}Z_{t}+2(z_{0}Z_{t})^{2}\right]\exp\left(-2z_{0}Z_{t}% \right)\quad.
